content:
Sure, here's an example:

{Hi|Hey|Hello} {{first\_name}},

My name is [Your Name] from [Your Company]. We specialize in providing in-depth Microsoft training for government organizations at the local and state level.

Our training solutions are designed to improve workflows, increase productivity, and maximize the ROI of Microsoft 365 features for government leaders.

I was wondering, {{first\_name}}, if you are the best person to discuss these initiatives with? Let me know and we can arrange a time to talk further.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
